universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation

Class FragmentAnnotations

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.fragment.annotation.FragmentAnnotations

  • public final class FragmentAnnotations
extends Object
    Annotation utils for the Fragments library.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  FragmentAnnotations.FieldProcessor
      Simple callback which allows processing of all declared fields of a desired class via iterateFields(FragmentAnnotations.FieldProcessor, Class, Class).

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • checkIfEnabledOrThrow

        public static void checkIfEnabledOrThrow()
        Performs check for enabled state of the annotations processing for the Fragments library.

        This check is requested mostly from parts of the Fragments library that require to be annotations processing enabled.

        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - If annotations processing is disabled.

      • obtainAnnotationFrom

        @Nullable
public static <A extends Annotation> A obtainAnnotationFrom(@NonNull
                                                                       Class<A> classOfAnnotation,
                                                                       @NonNull
                                                                       Class<?> fromClass,
                                                                       @Nullable
                                                                       Class<?> maxSuperClass)
        Obtains the requested type of annotation from the given fromClass if it is presented.
        Type Parameters:
        A - Type of the requested annotation.
        Parameters:
        classOfAnnotation - Class of the requested annotation.
        fromClass - Class from which should be the requested annotation obtained.
        maxSuperClass - If not null, this method will be called (recursively) for all super classes of the given annotated class (max to the specified maxSuperClass excluding) until the requested annotation is presented and obtained, otherwise annotation will be obtained only from the given annotated class.
        Returns:
        Obtained annotation or null if the requested annotation is not presented for the given class or its supers if requested.

      • iterateFields

        public static void iterateFields(@NonNull
                                 FragmentAnnotations.FieldProcessor processor,
                                 @NonNull
                                 Class<?> ofClass,
                                 @Nullable
                                 Class<?> maxSuperClass)
        Iterates all declared fields of the given ofClass.
        Parameters:
        processor - Field processor callback to be invoked for each of iterated fields.
        ofClass - Class of which fields to iterate.
        maxSuperClass - If not null, this method will be called (recursively) for all super classes of the given class (max to the specified maxSuperClass excluding), otherwise only fields of the given class will be iterated.
